description.value: -3 Toughness, +3 Intelligence, -5 Willpower, +5 Fellowship. Gain Literacy and Speak (High Gothic) as trained skills. Add +3 Ship Points to group's starting ship, cannot exchange these for Profit Factor. Gain +5 to Fellowship Tests interacting with high-ranking officials of the Imperium and Imperial Nobility. Gain an appropriate Enemy Talent as an unseen foe seeks the character's position and wealth.

talents: as an unseen foe seeks the character&#x27
